techmeme.title: Leaked documents show an AI upgrade led to an incident where Alexa seemed to favor Kamala Harris over Donald Trump; Amazon says the error was fixed (Caroline O'Donovan/Washington Post)
A review of Honor's Magic V3, a foldable phone that is thinner than the Galaxy Z Fold6 at 9.2mm when folded, launching for £1,699 in the UK and €1,999 in the EU (Simon Hill/Wired)
Telegram radically alters its stance on "illegal" use of its platform by letting users in private chats "flag illegal content" for review by its moderators (Danny Nelson/CoinDesk)
Pavel Durov calls his arrest by French authorities "misguided" and denies Telegram is an "anarchic paradise", in his first public comments since the detention (The Guardian)
Analysts raise questions over Brazilian digital bank Nubank's rising default rate, even as loans grow 28% YoY; ~60% of all Brazilian adults have Nubank's app (Bloomberg)
